text: The teachers are very good as they will give feedback on the child progress after class (positive feedback and recommendation to improve, if any). My son was transferred from another Berries centre as we have just moved to this area. We never had such interaction with the Berries teachers in the previous centre and we are glad that the teachers in Mountbatten  are genuinely care for the progress of the students!
Great experience. All staffs are very friendly, nice, and helpful!
Note this facility is moving away in June 2023
